name: Charity Rush
description:
After starting the coronavirus quarantine, many people were unable to have food or clothing
supplies in their homes, Wiviam gave his companions the necessary supplies to help all possible people.

Controls
Keyboard
Player

AWSD: Move
Space: Grab

Tips
-Moving sideways gives you an increase in speed unlike walking in front -Look carefully at the waiting time so you don't lose people

Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/EvilHamster9)
